items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a Great Closet Piece!
items.body: This dress is super cute! The length is great and adds some fun flair with the slit! The sleeves aren’t super puffy which is nice and it fits really nice to give a nice shape to your body! Read more
items.author: everydaywith_jamie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, wish it fit
items.body: This dress would be perfect for the holidays or a wedding. It was big along the chest if I moved my shoulders in (see the pic), which is why I didn’t keep it. Otherwise, everything was perfect. It came below the knees, the slit wasn’t too high, all very in style. It wasn’t tight on the stomach so I didn’t feel like I needed Spanx. Loved the red color and the material was nice. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering dress
items.body: LOVE this dress. Super flattering and comfortable. I am 5'6 - 165lbs, large bust 36DDD and medium fit very well. Not too tight. Flattering on most body types I would think. The blue color is stunning, and the material doesn't feel cheap. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Velvet is soft
items.body: Just as picture. Beautiful dress for funeral Read more
items.author: Josephine Yabann

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Teen looking. Not for me.
items.body: Once I put this dress on it looked very young, teenage like. I would describe it as princess looking. Read more
items.author: MGWC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress
items.body: This was adorable but unfortunately, I don't have enough on top to fill it out. It went back. Read more
items.author: Linda DR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy!
items.body: The dress is beautiful! Great price! Read more
items.author: Esther

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: P1017 Coffee, Sail Blue, P705 Teal, Vivid Red, Black, Berry Violet, Green, P505 Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
